resources.string:
Add the widget for the goal you want to track here.

You can set the name of your goal and how often you want to reach it here. I recommend to start with a small goal and build a habit of feeling a sense of accomplishment when clicking the widget and seeing that it's green afterwards.

Have fun reaching your goal!
How often do you want to reach your goal? Every

Hey there! :D

Super awesome that you downloaded WorkoutPixel.

To start using it, go to your homescreen and add your first WorkoutPixel widget.
